title: Coronavirus (COVID-19)
author: Government; Canada
cleaned_text: Living with COVID-19 Stay informed and learn how we can work together to keep New Brunswickers safe and prevent the spread of COVID-19. Testing PCR testing PCR tests for COVID-19 are available when requested by a primary care provider. Rapid test pick up Rapid POCT tests should only be used when an individual develops symptoms. You can book an appointment to pick up a rapid test kit, even if you're currently feeling well, to use if symptoms develop later. Register to pick up at-home rapid test kits If you need help booking a POCT appointment, contact Tele-Services at 1-833-437-1424 and an agent will assist you. Resources Awareness resources for citizens, businesses, and organizations. Caring for someone with COVID-19 People with COVID-19 who are at high risk of serious illness may be able to access [Paxlovid.](/content/gnb/en/corporate/promo/covid-19/treatments.html) Contacts Health questions Tele-Care: 811
